manageTutorialGroups.title: Tutorial Groups Management
manageTutorialGroups.tableCaption: Tutorial Groups defined for this course

deleteButton.question: Are you sure to delete the Tutorial Group with title {{ title }}?
deleteButton.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the title of the tutorial group to confirm.

titleInput.label: Title
titleInput.maxLengthValidationError: Title can be max {{ max }} characters long!

teachingAssistantInput.label: Tutor
teachingAssistantInput.placeholder: Select a tutor that will be responsible for this group.
teachingAssistantInput.requiredValidationError: A tutorial groups needs a tutor assigned!
teachingAssistantInput.taHelp: You can search by typing into the field.

campusInput.label: Campus
campusInput.placeholder: Select a campus where this group meets.
campusInput.campusHelp: You can search for a campus used in other tutorial groups by typing into the field.
campusInput.maxLengthValidationError: Campus is limited to {{ max }} characters!

additionalInformationInput.label: Additional Information
additionalInformationInput.placeholder: Additional information about the tutorial group.
additionalInformationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Additional information is limited to {{ max }} characters!

locationInput.placeholderOnline: How can the students join the online meeting?
locationInput.placeholderOffline: How can the students find the room?
locationInput.maxLengthValidationError: Location is limited to {{ max }} characters!

isOnlineInput.label: Does this tutorial group meet online of offline?
